thread.title: Pic: So (the) Michael O'Leary was checking people in at Dublin Airport this morning
thread.title_full: WTF | Pic: So (the) Michael O'Leary was checking people in at Dublin Airport this morning - entertainment.ie

author: Sheena McGinley
title: Pic: So (the) Michael O'Leary was checking people in at Dublin Airport this morning
text:
He may be the CEO of one of the biggest cost effective airlines, but that doesn't stop him getting on down with the people sometimes. That and he knows how social media works so this was bound to take off (pun partially intended - as always).
Michael O 'Leary just checked me in in London flight. Seriously. pic.twitter.com/XYAWcgfHfo
— Gary Dunne (@GaryDunne) October 6, 2015 Overall the reaction was positive...
@GaryDunne @gavinsblog On a serious note I've seen him do it before. Good for a CEO to work the trenches from time to time.
— Daragh O Brien (@daraghobrien) October 6, 2015 But, of course, there were the inevitable questions...
@gavinsblog @GaryDunne how much extra did that cost?
— Daragh O Brien (@daraghobrien) October 6, 2015 @GaryDunne Stuck for cash? Short staffed?
— Ann Marie Kelly (@AMKellyDJ) October 6, 2015 No... we'd guess the man just knows a good photo op when he sees it.
